posts.post_content:
Hello gang, I'm looking for a t200 in low grade.  I'm looking for:
Cleveland
Pittsburgh
NY Nationals

Looking for a low grade card, don't care if its graded or not.  No paper loss, rips or holes but creases and wear is great.  LMK what you got, thanks.

[url]stevensuckow@hotmail.com[/url] or send a pm.
